title: The Best of Germaine Gibson - Erotic Writings
description: The best of Germaine Gibson – contains extracts from all her erotic published stories.Each extract is complete in itself, a complete chapter or chapters or a complete scene within the novellas.Also included is Karolina the complete novelette.Coming soon to Germaine Gibson collection – the Voyeur – a brand new erotica novella.
author: Germaine Gibson
